kpi.name: M5000C328

kpi_info.title: SUM OF ACTIVE DC HSDPA USERS WITH TWO CARRIERS
kpi_info.use: The sum of sampled values for the number of active DC-HSDPA users. Active DC users use both carriers for transmission. UPDATED: The sampled number of users is summed to this counter. Only users which use both carriers for transmission whithin one TTI are counted. The counter is updated for both (primary and secondary) cells.

kpi.kpi_alias: SUM OF ACTIVE DC HSDPA USERS WITH TWO CARRIERS
